languages.text: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% dodge against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next turn.

languages.text: 每当装备者穿过被敌人占据的格子时，装备者对抗该名敌人的所有攻击都会获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，效果直到装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者穿过被敌人占据的格子时，装备者对抗该名敌人的所有攻击都会获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，效果直到装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

languages.text: Перемещаясь через клетку, занятую противником, персонаж получает +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от атак этого противника до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Перемещаясь через клетку, занятую противником, персонаж получает +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} от атак этого противника до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
Перемещаясь через клетку, занятую противником, персонаж получает +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} от атак этого противника до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: 敵に占有されたセルを通り抜けると、自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、その敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が+15%
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵に占有されたセルを通り抜けると、自身の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、その敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が+15%

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador atraviesa una casilla ocupada por un enemigo, obtiene +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra los ataques de ese enemigo hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador atraviesa una casilla ocupada por un enemigo, obtiene +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} contra los ataques de ese enemigo hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text: Wenn sich der Träger über ein von einem Feind besetztes Feld bewegt, erhält der Träger bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} für die Angriffe dieses Feindes.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn sich der Träger durch eine von einem Feind besetzte Zelle bewegt, erhält der Träger +15 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} für die Angriffe dieses Feindes bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Trägers.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur traverse une case occupée par un ennemi, il reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de +15 % pour contrer les attaques de cet ennemi jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur traverse une case occupée par un ennemi, il reçoit un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de +15 % pour contrer les attaques de cet ennemi jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
